basics.name: Reza Arabpour
basics.label: Faculty Affiliate Researcher
basics.summary: MSc candidate in Computational Science & Engineering at McMaster University with expertise in geometric deep learning and computational finance. Faculty Affiliate Researcher at Vector Institute focusing on Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning and hypernetworks for stochastic processes.

work.name: Vector Institute for Artificial Intelligence
work.summary: Conducting cutting-edge research at the intersection of AI and finance, developing hypernetworks for complex stochastic process approximation and collaborating on Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning methodologies.

work.name: McMaster University
work.summary: TA for three graduate-level machine learning and finance courses, supporting over 500 undergraduate students in Python programming and organizing bi-weekly CSE seminars.

work.name: Fintech Startup
work.summary: Engineered evolutionary-algorithm-driven trading strategies, conducted extensive Monte Carlo backtesting for risk-adjusted returns, and built quantitative models for financial markets.
